trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **NavigationFailed** event.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento **NavigationFailed**.

trans-unit.source: These event arguments contain information about a navigation that failed, and are passed to handlers of the **NavigationFailed** event, which is implemented by the following:
trans-unit.target: Estos argumentos de evento contienen información sobre una navegación fallida, y se pasa a los controladores de la **NavigationFailed** evento, que es implementado por el texto siguiente:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs> encapsulates the following details of the failed navigation request:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs> Encapsula los detalles siguientes de la solicitud de navegación fallida:

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Initiation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Navigator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Iniciación de navegación**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Navigator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Exception**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Exception%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Excepción de navegación**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Exception%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Content**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Uri%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Contenido de navegación**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Uri%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Details**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebResponse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Detalles de navegación**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebResponse%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation State**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Estado de navegación**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that was raised as the result of a failed navigation.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la excepción <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> que se produjo como consecuencia de una navegación fallida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that was raised as the result of a failed navigation.
trans-unit.target: La excepción <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> que se produjo como consecuencia de una navegación fallida.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Exception> will be either a <xref:System.Net.WebException> or an <xref:System.IO.IOException>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception> será un <xref:System.Net.WebException> o un <xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the optional data <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that was passed when navigation commenced.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> de datos opcionales que se pasó cuando la navegación comenzó.

trans-unit.source: The optional data <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that was passed when navigation commenced.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> de datos opcionales que se pasó cuando la navegación comenzó.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> can be used to pass context-specific data that is specific to a particular navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> puede utilizarse para pasar datos específicos del contexto que son específicos para una navegación determinada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> contains a reference to the object that is passed as the second argument when calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> contiene una referencia al objeto que se pasa como segundo argumento al llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: De lo contrario, es `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the failed navigation exception has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece si se ha controlado la excepción de navegación fallida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the exception is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> (default).
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se ha controlado la excepción; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" /> (valor predeterminado).

trans-unit.source: When you handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> to process an exception that is thrown as a result of a failed navigation, and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to continue processing the exception, you should set the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Cuando controlan <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> al proceso de una excepción que se produce como resultado de una navegación fallida y no desea [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] para continuar con el procesamiento de la excepción, debe establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A> propiedad `true`.

trans-unit.source: The navigator that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: Navegador que generó este evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the navigator that raised this event
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que es el navegador que generó este evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the content that could not be navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para el contenido al que no se pudo navegar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> for the content that could not be navigated to.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> para el contenido al que no se pudo navegar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the web request that was used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la solicitud web que se utilizó para solicitar el contenido especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> object that was used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> que se utilizó para solicitar el contenido especificado.

trans-unit.source: If navigating to an object, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si se navega a un objeto, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web request, and is protocol agnostic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> es una clase base abstracta que encapsula una solicitud web y es independiente del protocolo.

trans-unit.source: For each common protocol, the .NET Framework includes a class that derives from <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> and extends it with protocol-specific state and behavior, including:
trans-unit.target: Para cada protocolo, .NET Framework incluye una clase que deriva de <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> y se extiende con comportamiento y estado específicos de protocolo, incluidos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que utilizan el `pack://` esquema para solicitar archivos de datos de aplicación (consulte [recursos de la aplicación de WPF, contenido y archivos de datos](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que utilizan el `http://` esquema para solicitar archivos de servidores Web.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que utilizan el `ftp://` esquema para solicitar archivos de servidores FTP.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que utilizan el `file://` esquema para solicitar archivos locales.

trans-unit.source: Gets the web response that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la respuesta web que se devolvió después de intentar descargar el contenido especificado solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> que se devolvió después de intentar descargar el contenido especificado solicitado.

trans-unit.source: If the navigation failed, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebResponse" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si se produjo un error en la navegación, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebResponse" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType> is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web response, and is protocol agnostic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType> es una clase base abstracta que encapsula una respuesta web y es independiente del protocolo.

trans-unit.source: For each common protocol, the .NET Framework includes a class that derives from <xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType> and extends it with protocol-specific state, including:
trans-unit.target: Para cada protocolo, .NET Framework incluye una clase que deriva de <xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType> y se extiende con un estado específico del protocolo, incluidos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que utilizan el `pack://` esquema para solicitar archivos de datos de aplicación (consulte [recursos de la aplicación de WPF, contenido y archivos de datos](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que utilizan el `http://` esquema para solicitar archivos de servidores Web.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que utilizan el `ftp://` esquema para solicitar archivos de servidores FTP.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que utilizan el `file://` esquema para solicitar archivos locales.
